function.name: washingSpinDryLevel_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the spin dry level of a washing machine.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the spin dry level.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to set the spin dry level.

spinDryLevel.description: The specific spin dry level to set on the washing machine.
